0: Public transportation next door and underground car park
The hotel also offers a Parking garage for around 20 Euros per day which is a reasonable price for Milan
Very good hotel secure parking helpful staff
The hotel is also near in the park where you can roam around
Very comfortable hotel and very good conditionsbreakfast very good sauna is good and little far away city central ned to 15 min with taxi but generally very good only need 20 euro for daily park
Lots of free parking outside the hotel and close to tram and bus stations
In general we had a nice stay and we where lucky enough to be able to park in front of the hotel on the 3 3stret so we saved the 20Euros the hotel is charging for parking per night
It was nice to have hotel´s own parking place as we took our own car
Really helpful staff easy parking in secure car park great room

but good transport links trams etc 1 minute away and if you are brave enough 15 minute drive to city centre and all the sites lots of carparks Again you will need to be brave and have good spacial awareness
1: I left my rental car in the hotel garage and on the recommendation of the hotel desk staff took bus 57 which was a 20 minute ride right to the core
25Euros i believe but we chose to park for free on the main road which was fine
You have to check in before you can drive to the underground parking
2: All our questions were answered very satisfactory Parking is free on the street outside and parking at the hotels underground garage is only 20 Euro per dayTransport to the city centre is easy by rail tram no 12 or bus no 57 in 20 minutes
3: Parking is arranged near the hotel
Wifi free through outParking € 20 night in the car park or free parking on the road outside
Rooms are acceptable but carpark is really expensive
4: Off street private parking was a good facility although slightly on the expensive side

you will need a car if you stay at this hotel as it is aruond 25 minutes away from the city centre and taxis could get expensive not sure how far away it is from the nearest tube Parking should have been free for hotel guests especially given the lack of free street parking in the surrounding roads
